dt-api.name: cells().every()
dt-api.summary: Iterate over each selected cell, with the function context set to be the cell in question.

type.parameter:
Function to execute for every cell selected. The function's content is set to be an API instance for the cell in question.
As of DataTables 1.10.8 the function is passed the following parameters:
1. Cell's row index 2. Cell's column index 3. Table loop counter 4. Cell loop counter
No return value is expected or acted upon.
type.returns: DataTables API instance of the selected cells.

example.title: Add a class to cells which meet a logical requirement in the source data
